article_node.title: Microsoft’s Windows 10 support extension - lifeline or stay of execution?
article_node.summary: Microsoft's extension of security updates for Windows 10 provides businesses with additional time to plan migrations, reducing immediate risks associated with outdated systems. However, this delay may lead to complacency, loss of internal knowledge, and increased technical debt, complicating future transitions. Organizations are urged to view this extension as a final opportunity to modernize their systems and avoid the pitfalls of relying on unsupported software.
